short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimalistic, configurable new tab page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple New Tab is a minimalistic new tab page. Features include:

- Customizable colors and fonts!
- Easy configuration to change specific components.
- A clock displaying your local time.
- A new quote every time you open a new tab.
- Weather information for your local area with OpenWeather.
- Displaying your current Discord status.
- Importing and exporting your settings to share with others.

Source code is available at https://github.com/cubedhuang/simple-new-tab
